rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small lobby area that leads to the living room and dining area. Incorporates Art Deco geometric patterns on the floor.
Spacious living area with Art Deco design elements like streamlined furniture and decorative moldings. Provides a view of the outdoor space.
Open dining area adjacent to the living room featuring geometric Art Deco patterns on wall panels and lighting fixtures. Designed for entertaining guests.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout incorporating Art Deco elements such as chrome finishes and symmetrical patterns. Includes ample storage.
Compact servant's quarters with basic amenities, ensuring privacy while remaining functional and connected to the main house via a discreet corridor.
Sufficient bathroom area for guests in proximity to the living and dining areas. Features Art Deco fixtures and vanity.

openings.description: Main entrance door with decorative Art Deco handles and a welcoming threshold. Provides access to the entrance hall.
Large window overlooking the front yard with geometric patterned frames complementing the Art Deco theme.
